definitions.definition: A partially abandoned city and ghost town in northern Ukraine , known as the site of a nuclear disaster .
( by extension ) The 1986 nuclear accident which resulted in the abandonment of the aforementioned city.
examples: After Chernobyl , very few nuclear power plants were built for years.

main_definition: A partially abandoned city and ghost town in northern Ukraine , known as the site of a nuclear disaster .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) The 1986 nuclear accident which resulted in the abandonment of the aforementioned city.

main_definition: ( by extension ) A major nuclear-energy accident.
